text: Summer Lightning is a 1933 British comedy film directed by Maclean Rogers and starring Ralph Lynn, Winifred Shotter, Chili Bouchier and Horace Hodges. It is based on the 1929 novel Summer Lightning by P.G. Wodehouse. ==Premise== Hugo Carmody, the impoverished secretary to Lord Emsworth falls for Millicent the boss's niece, and steals his Lordship's prize pig in a scheme to raise funds to marry her. ==Cast== * Ralph Lynn – Hugo Carmody * Winifred Shotter – Millicent Keeble * Chili Bouchier – Sue Brown * Horace Hodges – Lord Emsworth * Helen Ferrers – Lady Emsworth * Esme Percy – Baxter * Miles Malleson – Beach * Gordon James – Pillbeam * Joe Monkhouse - Pigman ==References== ==External links== Category:1933 films Category:British films Category:English-language films Category:1933 comedy films Category:British comedy films Category:Films based on works by P.
